name: flynn
text: This idea has erotic potential.

name: chaesar
text: Somebody catch Teodor, he's falling.

name: mrmacky
text: Nice!

name: rotavele
text: Thanks for pointing that out, it made me give this strip a clear 5.

name: lexsenthur
text: He's been falling for a decade or so. Right now, "catching" him would require a time machine or a gun.

name: djwhiterabbit
text: i'm wondering how andy drinks one of his many stacked beers.  perhaps vlad is pourink one down his robot throat.

name: chaesar
text: A comment left by chaesar was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by lamelliform, _cheesekayke, Siah, PoodleLucy)

name: connellingus
text: I think the insensitive organics in the room have mistaken Andy for furniture and are placing their empties on him.

name: deusoma
text: Perhaps robots don't fall down when they pass out from drinking too much.

name: dak
text: He had the bottles on his head in the previous strip as well though.

name: ezcmac
text: Beef's evaluatation reveals flaws in Vlad's Virtual Subway.

name: deancain29
text: mama-bird

name: honesttom
text: I've given every strip in this arc so far a 5. I feel like a kiss-ass, but I really, really love this arc.

name: cailetshadow
text: I feel pretty confident that this is the only webcomic out there that would use the phrase "maternal succor" in the alt text.

name: dallovich
text: Molly really has a way of getting the worst jobs where she is treated in the worst way possible.

name: tellumo
text: Well, she doesn't have to stick anything (other than sandwiches) into herself, so she figured she'd give it a go.

name: tenthman
text: Andy is rocking three cold ones on his "head."  A solid wingman for any night of debauch.

name: soticoto
text: I'm sure Vlad was never that short before.

name: agentj
text: Mmmmmm. Mop closet.

name: gussiejives
text: Until you are soooooo nude....

name: xiaomimi
text:
Wednesday Blogs

Philippe: I need advice.

name: direhaggis
text: Beef raises an eyebrow of interest in panel #3. He must know more.

name: achilleselbow
text: Answer to the alt-text: virgin/whore complex. Supposedly it structures the sexual psychology of all males to some extent, but perhaps Russians such as Vlad and myself are particularly prone to it.

name: wittyname
text: Are you admitting to enjoying the debasement of women, achilleselbow?

name: charchar
text:
evaluatate

It looks so wrong, yet feels so right

name: mattylite
text: Whoa, I would never have noticiced

name: pogo
text: Say it with me, boys:  "Chew the sandwich, you nasty dame!"

name: poodlelucy
text: i admit i read this strip superficially and missed many important details. upon re-inspection, i cannot give it less than a 5.

name: sp1derbaby
text:
Vlad just steamrolled over Ray's weird sandwich concept in the "I've had enough of listening to this crap" style!

Beef's transitions ("not interested", "not interested at all", "intrigued", "aroused", "excited", "distraught") really make this strip.

name: unkle_bob
text: Am I the only person who has never encountered 'you drive' with respect to who sits down and types/clicks when multiple dudes are about to do something on the computer? Am I the only only mindblown by this turn of phrase?

name: unkle_bob
text:
only one*

Aww man....

name: bungdeetle
text: Is Ray rubbing his nipple in panel 3?

name: heccibiggs
text: Thumbs-upping, yo.

name: retinarow
text:
He's giving Vlad his thumpuppance.

Too much?

name: philophobe
text:
Oddly enough, I think my favorite part of this strip is totally perfect way Vlad's awkward diction is conveyed through punctuation:

'You are Vlad's mama-bird, tonight!'

Without that comma, I'd say this last panel would've been maybe 50-60% less funny.

name: carlyle
text: I am actually... pretty disturbed. Thinking of Molly putting on her best false-erotic face to eat a sandwhich to boost sales at a Subway. I... I need to go cry.

name: darkkarma42
text: I love Ray's sad face in the last panel.  Roast Beef's pain is his pain :(

name: gorrioncita
text: i think his face is just expressing his doubts about the erotic power of the whole exercise, really.
